name: Organic Finishing Powder Setting
description: Organic finishing powder. Translucent powder gives you camera ready finish, keeps shine at bay all day and won't highlight wrinkles like other powders can. Bonus: it smells like pie üç∞and comes in a heavyweight glass jar with metal lid. Non-GMO and plastic free packaging will help take care of the earth while also taking perfect care of your face. Powder is translucent so is great for all skin tones. Nothing synthetic . Ingredients: Corn Starch*, Arrowroot Powder*, Cinnamon *, Nutmeg, Raw Cocoa Powder* Shop Info: We believe that your skin is just as vital as any other organ in your body. Here at Butter Me Up Organics we like to say, "Don't put anything on your body that you wouldn't put in it." So, on that note, all of our products are completely edible. They may not be so tasty, however, but everything we use are non- toxic premium ingredients. Can you say that about the products you're currently using?
